summary_text:
The Unified Architecture Summary integrates all verified COMDEX layers — from field dynamics (F-series) through predictive cognition (P-series). This synthesis validates cross-domain coherence under a single constant set (v1.2), demonstrating a reproducible continuum from fundamental geometry to cognitive emergence.

Evolutionary Hierarchy:
  • F-series → Field & Vacuum Dynamics
  • G-series → Geometric Coupling (Spacetime–Information Unification)
  • H-series → Temporal Emergence (Entropy → Time Directionality)
  • N-series → Nonlinear Feedback (Stability Regulation)
  • O-series → Observer–Causality (Reflective Regulation)
  • P-series → Predictive Resonance (Cognitive Unification)

System-wide reproducibility has been confirmed via the registry and verifier, covering 111 modules and establishing complete internal consistency. This marks the closure of the COMDEX Unified Framework Phase I.

Phase II adds J1–J4 stability-refinement results beneath the N-series, completing the unified feedback–diffusion–stability hierarchy.
